text: Effusion can refer to: *(Chemistry) Effusion, the process of gases passing through a small hole *(Medicine), the seeping of fluid into a body cavity; also the fluid itself; an abnormal collection of fluid in a body cavity or space, such as **Ascites **Pericardial effusion **Pleural effusion **Joint effusion **Knee effusion **Sometimes called "hydrops". See Hydrops (disambiguation) *(Geology), effusive eruption, effusion of lava from a volcano
title: Effusion (disambiguation)
